cards.name: Pyromaz
cards.flavorText: Really into that old Prodigy song... Firestarter...

cards.name: NewNewCard
cards.flavorText: Really into that old Prodigy song... Firestarter...

cards.name: Quazi
cards.description: Feral, Overflow 2, End: 2 damage to this and adjacent zombies
cards.flavorText: Has a great fascination with church bells...

cards.name: Burrrnn
cards.flavorText: So he likes all the pretty bright colors, can you blame him?

cards.name: Cynderman
cards.flavorText: Hot, so very hot - all the time!

cards.name: Werezomb
cards.flavorText: Stop, stop, stop, shh-shh, you'll cause a howel

cards.name: Modo
cards.description: Feral, Overflow 5, End: 4 damage to this and adjacent zombies
cards.flavorText: JuuuZZZt WaNt a LiTtlE hUgGG...

cards.name: Fire-Maw
cards.flavorText: There's always an aftershock, duck twice

cards.name: Zhampion
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Summon two 1/1 enemy Pyromaz zombies
cards.flavorText: I AM THE CHAMPION - my friend!! ME - ONLY ME!!!

cards.name: Gargantua
cards.flavorText: (sing) Under pressure... coming down on you...

cards.name: Cerberus
cards.flavorText: Its ALWAYS a party of three

cards.name: Izze
cards.flavorText: It would be a-lot Izzier if you just stay put!

cards.name: Znowman
cards.description: Heavy, Enemies that attack this become Frozen
cards.flavorText: Maybe the snow does have some magical power?! But not yellow snow...

cards.name: Ozmoziz
cards.description: Entry: Freeze a random ally, add Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: He always loved to tell a goo story

cards.name: Jetter
cards.flavorText: Most welcomed during hot summer days on the busy city streets

cards.name: Freezzee
cards.description: Entry: Freeze zombie and adjacent zombies, 2 damage if Frozen
cards.flavorText: How he loves decorating with ice sculptures... Everywhere!

cards.name: Geyzer
cards.description: Entry: Freeze 2 random allies, add Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: Not in the mood for dancing...

cards.name: Blizzard
cards.flavorText: If you can't join them, FREEZE them!

cards.name: Froztbite
cards.flavorText: He's been trying to get out for a millennia - thank you global warming!!

cards.name: Zhatterer
cards.flavorText: So the other day Gargantua asked for a toothpick.. and it needs to be really cold to actually work...

cards.name: Maelstrom
cards.description: Entry: Return all zombies to their owners' Hands
cards.flavorText: Sometimes pukes a little in his mouth from all the spinning, but keeps a scary face!

cards.name: Tzunamy
cards.description: Entry: 2 damage to all enemies, then Freeze them
cards.flavorText: Bringing a nice, big shower, cleaning an entire city at a time.

cards.name: Rockky
cards.flavorText: Addriaaannn!!! Addriaaaaaannnnn!!!

cards.name: Bolderr
cards.flavorText: One more step, just one more step!

cards.name: Blocker
cards.flavorText: Just a few more moments...

cards.name: Slab
cards.flavorText: Supressing all those emotions does have it's price...

cards.name: Pit
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: Hard to save every drop with all the spillage

cards.name: Golem
cards.flavorText: mmMMWhaaaaat?

cards.name: Walley
cards.flavorText: Eeeeeeva

cards.name: Tiny
cards.flavorText: Cooookie... just one more cooookie...

cards.name: Spiker
cards.flavorText: Standing really still... maybe they won't notice

cards.name: Crater
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: Try to veer from his major crater issues... it may goo deeeeep

cards.name: Earthshaker
cards.flavorText: Will break ALL your WALLS!!

cards.name: IgneouZ
cards.description: Heavy, Entry: If your Overlord has 10 Def or less, this gets +2 Def
cards.flavorText: Mmmm, nothing like the smell of fresh cinder and ash in the morning

cards.name: Pyrite
cards.flavorText: Angry enough to go though a WALL!

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavorText: When the mountain comes to you... you'll run!

cards.name: Gaea
cards.description: Entry: All ally Earth zombies in play get +1 Atk
cards.flavorText: Either super charismatic, or super scary... or both

cards.name: Whizpar
cards.flavorText: The unfriendly ghost...

cards.name: Wheezy
cards.description: Entry: A random card in your Hand gets -1 cost
cards.flavorText: Ommmmmmmmmmm

cards.name: Soothsayer
cards.flavorText: Almost as good as a fortune cookie... minus the cookie

cards.name: Fumez
cards.description: Entry: Add a Tainted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: RAZENGAAAAAAAA!!!

cards.name: Pushhh
cards.description: Entry: Return a zombie to its owner's hand
cards.flavorText: Like any adolescent child that wishes you to leave him be... so GO AWAY!!

cards.name: Ztormmcaller
cards.flavorText: Thor's best student just got a little angrier...

cards.name: Bouncer
cards.flavorText: From a young age he just loves to bounce things - especially rocks... on other rocks...

cards.name: Gaz
cards.description: Guard, Entry: Add a Corrupted Goo to your Hand
cards.flavorText: No, no, no no, not a hamster, not a hamster ball....

cards.name: Draft
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card from the enemy deck
cards.flavorText: Not your father... hopefully

cards.name: MonZoon
cards.description: Costs 1 less for each other Air zombie in your hand
cards.flavorText: Shock therapy does work wonders

cards.name: Zeuz
cards.flavorText: From mount Zolimpus in the sky - fear Ze-might of ZeuZ!

cards.name: Ztorm Shield
cards.description: Guard, Entry: Give adjacent zombies Guard
cards.flavorText: A zombie doing ninja hand signs to produce a sphere of wind around it, to protect it from various projectives coming at it.

cards.name: Azuraz
cards.flavorText: Beeee yourself!

cards.name: Bloomer
cards.description: Entry: Draw a card if you have a Life zombie in play
cards.flavorText: Fertilizing the flowers on an hourly basis

cards.name: Zap
cards.flavorText: Can't get enough of that goo, ever

cards.name: Shroom
cards.flavorText: Some like to grow flowers, others grow hallucinogenic poison mushrooms...

cards.name: Vindrom
cards.flavorText: BDSM much?!

cards.name: Puffer
cards.description: Entry: +1 Atk to all Life zombies in play
cards.flavorText: All the pretty pretty flowers

cards.name: Sapper
cards.description: Attack: Restore 1 Def for each damage this deals.
cards.flavorText: Hungry, always so very hungry

cards.name: Keeper
cards.flavorText: They are usually such lovely beasts...

cards.name: Cactuz
cards.flavorText: And so he walked the desert for 40 years, only to find he's been walking in circles....

cards.name: Shammann
cards.flavorText: Dancing around a fire alone is a hoot, but bringing all your dead friends to join is a party!

cards.name: Z-Virus
cards.description: Devour all ally zombies, gain their Atk and Def
cards.flavorText: There ain't no party like a Z-Virus party!

cards.name: Yggdrazil
cards.description: Entry: Reanimate all Life zombies that died this match
cards.flavorText: In this case, lots of strings attached!!

cards.name: Poizom
cards.flavorText: Just like any frat boy, after the Friday night bash - bloated, gassy, puking and generally unpleasant to be around...

cards.name: Hazmaz
cards.flavorText: Being cooped up inside a plastic suit is no fun - now time this by a 1,000 with all the extra gases, something's gotta give...

cards.name: Zpitter
cards.flavorText: Lamma in my living room... bam ba balalam babam ba ba...

cards.name: Zeptic
cards.flavorText: After four steps he gave up on the straight light and started puking

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavorText: Being dead has its perks, but in this case time and humidity has not been kind - the rotting flesh is literally sapping off the bone on this one

cards.name: Zeeter
cards.flavorText: Nam, naam nam nam namm nam...

cards.name: Hazzard
cards.flavorText: Almost reached the Goo-Anonymous meeting - almost...

cards.name: Zludge
cards.flavorText: Bring it, bring It, BRING IT ON!!!

cards.name: Ectoplasm
cards.flavorText: Wha'ch yu lookin at' ?!

cards.name: Cherno-bill
cards.flavorText: Lumbering around in a world made of butter gets old real fast, maybe that's why he's sooo angry!

cards.name: GooZilla
cards.description: Entry: Return 4 goo, and use all your goo for 2X Atk/Def
cards.flavorText: More, more, MORE GOO! Bring me ALL the GOO

cards.name: Zlopper
cards.description: +1 Atk to all ally Toxic zombies
cards.flavorText: A frail zombie with one massive arm that he's dragging on the floor.

cards.name: Chainsaw
cards.description: +4 Attack to zombie; End: 4 damage to this zombie
cards.flavorText: Cutting through flesh, bone and even steel, it's easy to see why this is a fan-favorite!

cards.name: Goo Beaker
cards.flavorText: So much goo, so little space

cards.name: Stapler
cards.flavorText: No pain, no gain.

cards.name: Nail Bomb
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to zombie and adjacent zombies
cards.flavorText: When you really want to nail it!

cards.name: Goo Bottles
cards.flavorText: Adding more goo to an already overly-goo-ed party is just too goo-d!

cards.name: Fresh Meat
cards.description: Entry: All enemy zombies get -3 Atk until the end of turn
cards.flavorText: As if they died again and went to zombie heaven

cards.name: Tainted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 3, disables 1 goo vial for next turn
cards.flavorText: Smells kinda funny, but what a rush!

cards.name: Corrupted Goo
cards.description: Overflow 6, disables 2 goo vials for next turn
cards.flavorText: Hooooweeee, better than all the moonshine!

cards.name: Rainz
cards.description: Entry: Restore 10 Def randomly split among allies
cards.flavorText: A zombie wearing the typical yellow raincoat, looking up to the sky, with its hands outstretched to the sky, and goo is raining around it. Use a worm's eye view angle to show the goo falling from the sky more clearly.

cards.name: Blight
cards.description: Delayed 3: Place two 4/4 copies of this zombie in play then Destroy this
cards.flavorText: Show a bunch of plants, with blooming flowers, dripping with goo. 2 flowers however have not yet bloomed. They are still closed and inside the buds you can see a transulcent pod containing a life zombie embryo.

cards.name: Zteroid
cards.description: Death: All ally zombies in play get +2 Atk until end of turn
cards.flavorText: A muscular zombie with a hump on its back. A transparent membrane on the hump shows that it's full of goo. (like a camel)

cards.name: BurZt
cards.description: Feral, Entry: Cannot attack the enemy Overlord
cards.flavorText: A zombie holidng the head of another zombie from behind with both hands. The zombie in front is set ablaze, and screams in agony.

cards.name: Vortex
cards.description: Entry: Replace ally water zombies in play with stronger ones
cards.flavorText: A water zombie carrying another zombie over its head, lion king style, about to throw it into a violent whirlpool.

cards.name: Defender
cards.description: Entry: Give ally Earth zombies that cost 2 or less Heavy
cards.flavorText: A rock zombie using itself as a human shield to protect another zombie from that looks like fireballs being flung at them.
